tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
            player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
            position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
            team_id INT REFERENCES team(team_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE game_player (game_id INT REFERENCES game(game_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
            player_id INT REFERENCES player(player_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
            game_score INT,
            PRIMARY KEY (game_id, player_id));

CREATE TABLE TeamRoster (
    roster_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id UUID,
    player_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Team(team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Player(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TeamPosition (
    team_id UUID,
    position_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Team(team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (position_id) REFERENCES Position(position_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (team_id, position_id)
);
